title: Drawing, "Juno", 1731–1807
medium: Brush and brown wash, pen and ink, graphite on paper.
signed: Signed in graphite, lower right: Mariano Rossi
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Center left, Juno seated holding small temple surrounded by other various gods and mythical creatures.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Juno", 1731–1807.
1731–1807. Brush and brown wash, pen and ink, graphite on paper.. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-7332.
